Author: rms
Title: Fear MicrosoftNBC in the era of copyright tyranny

Author: rms
Content:
You could call it a human interest story until you get to the last two paragraphs. -- Jeff Bezos, founder of Amazon.com, is said to be developing a spaceport north of Van Horn, Texas. Bezos' Blue Origin is working to develop manned spaceflight for space tourists.

British billionaire Richard Branson also has announced plans to launch a space tourism company, which is expected to have its headquarters at the New Mexico spaceport.

Author: rms
Title: What kind of PR do you need to get onto CNN?
